title: Granite rock

properties.name: description
properties.value: Granite rocks are a type of rock found in the Desert Quarry south of the Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert. In the quarry, as in the desert, desert heat will continually reduce the player's Hitpoints unless the player has waterskins in inventory, or is wearing the Desert amulet 4. Prior to January 2007, no water was required in the quarry. Granite is mainly used for fast Mining training. There are three types of granite, 500g, 2 kg, and 5 kg, all rising in price respectively. Using a chisel, granite can be chiselled into smaller chunks, relative to their size, so you'll get ten 500g pieces of granite with one 5 kg piece.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Granite rock
Rocks
Released23 January 2006 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationDesert Quarry
OptionsMine, Prospect
ExamineA rocky outcrop.
Advanced data
Object ID11387

Granite rocks are a type of rock found in the Desert Quarry south of the Bandit Camp in the Kharidian Desert. In the quarry, as in the desert, desert heat will continually reduce the player's Hitpoints unless the player has waterskins in inventory, or is wearing the Desert amulet 4. Prior to January 2007, no water was required in the quarry. Granite is mainly used for fast Mining training. There are three types of granite, 500g, 2 kg, and 5 kg, all rising in price respectively. Using a chisel, granite can be chiselled into smaller chunks, relative to their size, so you'll get ten 500g pieces of granite with one 5 kg piece.

Contents

  • 1 Mining Info
  • 2 Types of granite
  • 3 Mining granite
    • 3.1 Mining chance
  • 4 Locations

Mining Info[edit | edit source]

Granite rock
Level required 45
Mining XP50, 60, 75
Required toolPickaxe
Respawn time5 seconds

Types of granite[edit | edit source]

A player must have Mining level of 45 or greater to mine granite, which yields the following experience shown below depending on the size the granite block mined.

Size XP Examine text
500g 50 A tiny chunk of granite.
2 kg 60 A small chunk of granite.
5 kg 75 A medium-sized chunk of granite.

Text messages:

  • Mine rocks - "You swing your pick at the rock", then "You manage to get some granite."
  • Prospect rocks - "This rock is granite."
  • Examine rocks - "A rocky outcrop."

Mining granite[edit | edit source]

Granite respawns quickly, so that a player can mine continuously at a group of only 3-4 rocks.

When granite is mined, the player randomly receives one of the three sizes of granite blocks. When wearing Varrock armour and the armour effect activates, the size of the second block of granite will be the same as the first block.

There is no way that the player can influence which block size is mined. However, by using a chisel, the player can carve the larger blocks into 500g ones: four 500g blocks from 2 kg, and ten from 5 kg (first by cutting the 5 kg block into two 2 kg and two 500g blocks, and then cutting the 2 kg blocks).

'''Granite rocks''' are a type of rock found in the [[Desert Quarry]] south of the [[Bandit Camp (Kharidian Desert)|Bandit Camp]] in the [[Kharidian Desert]]. In the quarry, as in the desert, [[desert heat]] will continually reduce the player's [[Hitpoints]] unless the player has [[waterskin]]s in inventory, or is wearing the [[Desert amulet 4]]. Prior to January 2007, no water was required in the quarry. [[Granite]] is mainly used for fast [[Mining training]]. There are three types of granite, 500g, 2 kg, and 5 kg, all rising in price respectively. Using a [[chisel]], granite can be chiselled into smaller chunks, relative to their size, so you'll get ten 500g pieces of granite with one 5 kg piece.

==Mining Info==
{{Mining info
|name = Granite rock
|level = 45
|xp = 50, 60, 75
|tool = [[Pickaxe]]
|time = 5 seconds
}}

==Types of granite==
A player must have [[Mining]] level of 45 or greater to mine [[granite]], which yields the following experience shown below depending on the size the granite block mined.

Text messages:
*Mine rocks - "You swing your pick at the rock", then "You manage to get some granite."
*Prospect rocks - "This rock is granite."
*Examine rocks - "A rocky outcrop."

==Mining granite==
[[Granite]] respawns quickly, so that a player can mine continuously at a group of only 3-4 rocks.

When granite is mined, the player randomly receives one of the three sizes of granite blocks. When wearing [[Varrock armour]] and the armour effect activates, the size of the second block of granite will be the same as the first block.

There is no way that the player can influence which block size is mined. However, by using a chisel, the player can carve the larger blocks into 500g ones: four 500g blocks from 2 kg, and ten from 5 kg (first by cutting the 5 kg block into two 2 kg and two 500g blocks, and then cutting the 2 kg blocks).
